description:
Tadpole Inc. is looking for employees. Are you ready to be their next professional friend?

In Here Comes Niko!, the cozy 3D platformer for tired people, youâ€™ll play as Niko traveling across scenic islands. Make new friends, catch fish, solve puzzles, snag bugs, and more! With Here Comes Niko! you're in for the most laid-back adventure of your life!
name: Here Comes Niko!
